generatedTitle: "A White Sport Coat (And a Pink Carnation): Marty Robbins' Chart-Topping Hit"

extractFactDictList.question: Who wrote and sang the song 'A White Sport Coat (And a Pink Carnation)'?

extractFactDictList.sentence: It was recorded on January 25, 1957, and released on the Columbia Records label on March 4,
